Package net.silthus.schat.chatter

Interface ChatterFactory

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface ChatterFactory
Used to create new instances of a chatter based on the type of the implementing platform.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default ChatterFactory
    addPointer(BiConsumer<UUID,Pointers.Builder> pointer)
    Adds a pointer to every chatter that is created by the factory.
    Chatter
    createChatter(UUID id)
    Creates a new chatter from the given id.
